news.title: 'See you in four years': Canada flexes economic muscle as tariff negotiations continue
news.summary: Trump's plans for tariffs and comments about Canada becoming a state has enraged the country's consumers and politicians. Trump's plan for tariffs has enraged consumers, politicians and businesses.

news.title: How the U.S. is losing ground to China in nuclear fusion, as AI power needs surge
news.summary: The U.S. has led the race to clean, limitless nuclear fusion energy. Now China is catching up, spending twice as much and building projects faster.

news.title: Trump administration sends a clear message to the oil and gas industry: 'You're the customer'
news.summary: The officials leading Trump's energy agenda downplayed climate change. They called for more energy production to support economic growth and national security. The officials called for an increase in domestic energy production.

news.title: After Elon Musk’s Delaware exit, state lawmakers weigh bill to overhaul corporate law
news.summary: Delaware lawmakers are considering a bill that aims to make the state attractive to investors and executives. The bill aims to improve the state's reputation as a place to do business.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 stocks for the long term
news.summary: TipRanks' analyst ranking service spotlights stocks favored by the Street's top pros. Zscaler and Costco Wholesale are among the companies highlighted.

news.title: ‘In their last days, our parents changed their will’: They left me $250,000, but gave my sister $1 million. What should I do?
news.summary: “How many people maintain a relationship with their siblings after their parents died?” he asks. “How much do you get from your siblings after your parents die?’”

news.title: I almost bought a $600K house, but a neighbor told me it has an ‘unsafe’ extension with no foundation. Does the seller have a duty to reveal this?
news.summary: “The next-door neighbor was going to buy it, but the seller warned him off,” the seller says. “The seller was like, ‘You’re not going to get it.’”

news.title: ‘He claims to be a nihilist’: I told my friend to sell his Tesla shares. He stopped speaking to me. Is that normal?
news.summary: “I’ve been trying to get him to diversify his retirement portfolio,” she says. “I want him to have a diversified portfolio.”

news.title: My husband has dementia and will need care. Will Medicaid go after my money if I use it to pay off our mortgage?
news.summary: “We still have around $300,000 left on our mortgage,” she says. “We’re still in the process of paying it off.”

news.title: ‘This woman destroyed my heart and soul’: After my wife died, her mother turned on me — and presented me with a secret will
news.summary: “She flipped a switch and instantly my wife’s entire family hated me,” he said of his ex-wife.
